algorithm_technique: Hash set/boolean array for efficient character lookup and iteration through words
problem_summary_simple: Count words that only contain characters from a given allowed set.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a boolean array to mark allowed characters, then iterates through words, checking each character against the lookup.
key_insights: Using a boolean array (or hash set) for `allowed` characters provides O(1) lookup.
Early exit from inner loop (break) optimizes checking each word.
The total time complexity depends on the length of `allowed` and the sum of lengths of all words.
